Description: Rock crystal bottle; carved with a later hinged lid decorated with silver-gilt and niello.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Calabria, MLA register: "From a Byzantine church in Calabria".
Bibliographic references: Pinder-Wilson 1954 / Some Rock Crystals of the Islamic Period (pl.xxxiii.a)
Shalem 1996 / Islam Christianized: Islamic Portable Objects in the Medieval Church Treasuries of the Latin West (7)
